content: {"locationId": "7397", "organizationId": "3472", "name": "Iglesia Evangelica De Cristo", "address1": "5929 Stone Avenue", "address2": null, "city": "Portage", "state": "IN", "zipCode": "46368", "country": null, "phone": "219-734-6651", "phoneExt": "Church", "website": null, "latitude": "41.56478", "longitude": "-87.18675", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  Lake and Porter county", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The mission of Iglesia Evangelica De Cristo is to assist and provide supplement food, furniture, house goods, etc. to those families which have been impacted by financial problems because of unemployment (lay-offs & downsizing), divorce, disability, health, domestic violence, homelessness, disaster, aging and rising cost of living.   We gather, store, and distribute goods to those who find themselves in time of special need and crisis. Our mission is based on a compassionate hand out and hand up as we respect the dignity of each person we serve. Our organization seeks to collaborate with those who share our mission.", "notes": "Our Pantry is client choice, and our services our inside our back hall     Located in the back, behind the mason lodge. long road   Things to bring   1.
